bug.author: jiemar
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.2.0 Describe the bug alluxio cannot visit hdfs To Reproduce
i set up alluxio cluster with raft-based embedded journal according to the wiki https://docs.alluxio.io/os/user/stable/en/deploy/Running-Alluxio-On-a-HA-Cluster.html then i config presto to query alluxio according to the wiki https://docs.alluxio.io/os/user/stable/en/core-services/Catalog.html when i query with presto like "select count(*) from db.table" the error message is : Query 20200421_120646_00011_77kp4 failed: Failed to list directory: alluxio://30.1.2.17:19998,30.5.2.16:19998/catalog/hivedemo1/tables/source_table_40x_cols/hive
Expected behavior alluxio should visit the hdfs to read data, and cache the data at alluxio works's ram
should i config alluxio according to wiki below to use presto to query hive table? <denchmark-link:https://docs.alluxio.io/os/user/stable/en/ufs/HDFS.html>https://docs.alluxio.io/os/user/stable/en/ufs/HDFS.html</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Please provide more information on the failure. Your presto logs should have more detailed information. Please also include your alluxio-site.properties configuration
